content: Can the order be placed without a part number?
No, the order must include a 13-digit part number to proceed.
What happens if the 13-digit part number is incorrect?
If the 13-digit part number is incorrect, the order cannot be processed. Please verify the part number and try again.
What is the significance of the 10-digit supply number?
The 10-digit supply number is used for calculation purposes, but the order is collected based on the 13-digit part number.
Can the supply number be used in place of the part number?
No, the supply number cannot replace the 13-digit part number for order collection.
The order is calculated using the 10-digit supply number, but it is collected based on the 13-digit part number.
Can I modify the part number after placing the order?
Once the order is placed, the part number cannot be modified. A new order will need to be created.
What should I do if the part number is missing from the order?
The part number is mandatory for order placement. Please ensure the part number is included before submitting the order.
How do I verify the part number for an order?
The part number can be verified through the product catalog or system, ensuring it matches the 13-digit format.
